title: Tender Loving Care 1973 Donna Young, Marilyn Joi, Michael Asher, Lauren Simon, Josh Taylor, Buck Flower, Carona Faoro, Kathy Hilton, Ellen Prince, Maxayn + Don Edmonds

sources.title: Tender Loving Care 1973 Donna Young, Marilyn Joi, Michael Asher, Lauren Simon, Josh Taylor, Buck Flower, Carona Faoro, Kathy Hilton, Ellen Prince, Maxayn + Don Edmonds
sources.description: Bethel Buckalew and Roger Corman produced B movie. Bad acting, bad directing, but features Maxayn on the soundtrack and in a live performance in the film.
